metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9355 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
danfruehauf NetworkManager-ssh before 1.2.11 allows privilege escalationbecause extra options are mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9355` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

network-manager-ssh - 1.2.11-1
network-manager-ssh-gnome - 1.2.11-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: network-manager-ssh package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.11-1').
